column4: can anyone tell me how to deactivate my media player that autoruns when i logg in?
thanks
okay
does anyone here familiar with xubuntu?
is*
What about xubuntu?
i have my media player starting up when i log in, and I want to deactivate that
do you know how to do this?
Hang on a sec while I log into xubuntu session
hey thanks!
On shutdown/logout the XFCE session has checkbox to remember/save desktop state. Quit MediaPlayer, then quit session and ensure save state/session is checked to make it go away
Is labeled save session for further logins

Worked for me

any ideas?

Try rm -rf .config and log back in.
